summary: This document consists of internal communications regarding AML compliance alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke. It discusses the clearance of alerts generated for these individuals and includes references to various KYC remediation cases involving Epstein and Indyke. The document highlights the review process for compliance and the expired identification of Darren Indyke.

persons.name: Kshitij Golani
persons.context: Kshitij Golani is responsible for reviewing and clearing AML alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in sending alerts regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke as part of KYC remediation.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as a signatory on various accounts related to Jeffrey Epstein and has expired identification.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of the AML compliance alerts and is noted as a signatory on multiple accounts.

persons.name: Carl Timcke
persons.context: Carl Timcke is involved in the communication regarding the alerts and has issues opening the attachments related to Epstein and Indyke.

persons.name: Darnetta Chandler-Johnson
persons.context: Darnetta Chandler-Johnson assigns KYC cases related to Epstein and Indyke and discusses the review process.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Indyke are signatories on multiple accounts and are involved in KYC remediation cases.
Cynthia Rodriguez communicates with Kshitij Golani regarding the clearance of AML alerts.
Kshitij Golani and Carl Timcke are both part of the AML Compliance team discussing alerts.

events.title: RDC/PCR Alerts Generated
events.description: Alerts for Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke were generated for review.

events.title: Previous Clearance of Alerts
events.description: The alerts for Epstein and Indyke were previously reviewed and cleared.

keyFacts: Kshitij Golani is the AML Compliance Officer who cleared alerts for Epstein and Indyke.
Darren Indyke's identification is noted as expired multiple times.
Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the KYC remediation process for Epstein and Indyke.
The alerts for Epstein and Indyke were generated on June 15 and 16, 2017.
The document includes multiple references to KYC accounts associated with Epstein and Indyke.
